title: Ennamo Nadakkirathe Song Lyrics Sandakozhi
stanzas:
yaar yaaro etho pesa
yaar yaaro etho ketka
un kuralaai ellaam ketkkirathe
yeah yeah
yaar yaaro ethire thondra
yaar yaaro kadanththu poga
unnai pol ellaam therigirathe
yeah..

kaathal vanthu kannukkulle
koodu kattiyathe
kallai pola poovai vaiththu
veedu kattiyathe
kaathal seida madaiya
endru kaathal thittiyathe
kathavai moodi vaiththapothum
jannal thattiyathe

oru paarvai.. oru paarvai
athu malai mele
thalai keezhaai thallum
maru paarvai, maru paarvai
athu meendum ennai
mele vara chollum

adada ennai maatti vittaale
azhagaai aabaththil maati vittaale
tholodu rekkai mulaikkuthe
kaal rendum kaaththil parakkuthe
ithu maayam manthiram illaiye
ada kaathal thollai

muthal muthalaai
mella thayangi
nettru poo kadaiyil
pookal vaanga nindren.
indru valaiyal kadai paarththu
unthan kai alavai kaattril
naanum varainthen

en paer enna yaaro ennai ketkka
un paer solli uthattinai kadiththen
engo naan piranththu vanthathu
unnodu sernththu vaazhava
iru ithayam ennul thudikkirathe
intha kaathalaale

yaar yaaro etho pesa
yaar yaaro etho ketka
un kuralaai ellaam ketkkirathe
yeah yeah
yaar yaaro ethire thondra
yaar yaaro kadanththu poga
unnai pol ellaam therigirathe
yeah..

seo.title: Ennamo Nadakkirathe Song Lyrics Sandakozhi
seo.description: Get the complete Ennamo Nadakkirathe Song Lyrics Sandakozhi from Sandakozhi. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Shaan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Sandakozhi, Yuvan, Shaan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
